response.original_title: I Love Life & I Love to Laugh
response.overview: If laugher is truly the best medicine, then Dennis Swanberg, America's "Minister of Encouragement," is just what the doctor ordered. With his down-home charm and heaping helping of hospitality, his Austin, Texas born pastor-turned-comedian has won the hearts of audiences across the country With his folksy, down-to-earth speaking style he tells stories hat will help lift the burden you may be bearing and encourage you through the merriment of laughter. In this DVD presentation filmed at Shadow Mountain Community Church, Dr. Swanberg shares stories that convey two things about himself: "I Love Life and I Love to Laugh."
response.title: I Love Life & I Love to Laugh
